snippet: The International Olympic Committee is engaged in “quiet diplomacy” with Russian leaders to make sure the Winter Games in Sochi are not affected by the country’s new antigay legislation.
abstract: International Olympic Committee is engaged in negotiations with Russian leaders to make sure the 2014 Olympics are not affected by the country’s new antigay legislation.
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee is engaged in “quiet diplomacy” with Russian leaders to make sure the Winter Games in Sochi are not affected by the country’s new antigay legislation.

headline.main: I.O.C. Negotiating With Russia Over Antigay Law
headline.print_headline:
I.O.C. Negotiating Plan
To Address Antigay Law
